text: Abderrazak Rassaa (; 4 January 1930 â€“ 7 January 2020) was a Tunisian politician. He was born in Tunis. He was a member of the Socialist Destourian Party. He served as Minister of Finance from 1969 to 1971. He was also Minister of Industry from 1968 to 1969. Rassaa died on 7 January 2020, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:2020 deaths Category:1930 births Category:Politicians from Tunis
title: Abderrazak Rassaa
